00002 
00003 // Helper macro to print text with bottom left alignment within box
00004 // The macro relies on yoff, y_ht, and xoff being set and will
00005 // update yoff. 
00006 #define TEXT_OUT_BL_C1(str,outline) \
00007         trect.left   = (int)(myrect->left +(xoff     )*xdpi/72.27)  ; \
00008         trect.right  = (int)(myrect->left +(xoff+x2ff)*xdpi/72.27)+1; \
00009         trect.top    = (int)(myrect->top  +(yoff     )*ydpi/72.27)  ; \
00010         trect.bottom = (int)(myrect->top  +(yoff+y_ht)*ydpi/72.27)+1; \
00011         \
00012         pDC->SetTextAlign(TA_BOTTOM|TA_LEFT); \
00013         pDC->TextOutA(trect.left,trect.bottom, str); \
00014         if (outline) pDC->FrameRect(&trect,&blackb);
00015

00029 // Helper macro to print MULTILINE text with top left alignment within box
00030 // The macro relies on yoff, y_ht, and xoff being set and will
00031 // update yoff. 
00032 #define TEXT_DRW_TL_C2(str,outline) \
00033         trect.left   = (int)(myrect->left +(xoff+x2ff)*xdpi/72.27);   \
00034         trect.right  = (int)(myrect->right-(xoff     )*xdpi/72.27)+1; \
00035         trect.top    = (int)(myrect->top  +(yoff     )*ydpi/72.27);   \
00036         trect.bottom = (int)(myrect->top  +(yoff+y_ht)*ydpi/72.27)+1; \
00037         \
00038         pDC->DrawText(str,&trect,DT_TOP|DT_LEFT); \
00039         if (outline) pDC->FrameRect(&trect,&blackb);

00056 // Helper macro to print text with bottom left alignment within box
00057 // The macro relies on yoff, y_ht, xoff, and x2ff being set and will
00058 // update yoff. 
00059 #define TEXT_OUT_CT(str,outline) \
00060         trect.left   = (int)(myrect->left +(xoff     )*xdpi/72.27)  ; \
00061         trect.right  = (int)(myrect->right-(xoff     )*xdpi/72.27)+1; \
00062         trect.top    = (int)(myrect->top  +(yoff     )*ydpi/72.27)  ; \
00063         trect.bottom = (int)(myrect->top  +(yoff+y_ht)*ydpi/72.27)+1; \
00064         \
00065         pDC->SetTextAlign(TA_BOTTOM|TA_CENTER); \
00066         pDC->TextOutA((trect.left+trect.right)/2,trect.bottom, str); \
00067         if (outline) pDC->FrameRect(&trect,&blackb);
